My Mauri Audit

A scientific journal for becoming the kaitiaki of your own energy.

Part 1: My Digital Habits

List the top 3-5 digital apps or activities you spend the most time on.

  1. __________________________________________________
  2. __________________________________________________
  3. __________________________________________________
  4. __________________________________________________
  5. __________________________________________________

Part 2: The 24-Hour Mauri Log

For the next 24 hours, for your top 3 habits, mindfully notice how you feel *before* and *after*. Use the scale below.

😞 (Drained) 😐 (Neutral) 😊 (Energised)
Digital Activity Feeling BEFORE Feeling AFTER Time Spent

Part 3: Data Analysis

Look at your log. What patterns do you see?

Part 4: My Mauri Protection Plan

Based on your analysis, create a simple, realistic plan to protect your mauri.

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

Quality teaching resources for Aotearoa New Zealand educators, honoring mātauranga Māori and contemporary pedagogy.
